text: Gumazir kurar kaba arazir kuram damuva gumazamizibar biziba ko men dagɨaba uari bagh da iniasa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me arazir e damuan koghamibar men sure gami. Egha arazir kamɨn me gumazamizir mabar men adarasi sara, men nɨghnɨzir gavgavibagh asɨghasɨsi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ nɨ me mɨkemeghtɨ me akar katam mɨkɨman markɨ.
